name: Sandfall
description:
SUMMARY:


Sandfall is a 2D old-school RPG by the makers of Skyfall.

The Sand War, a destructive and bloody conflict that took place over 30 years ago, still inflicts collateral damages on the continent. Quicksand Purges, the sudden apperance of dangerous fiends, are a constant threat to the population, while no one knows how to stop them or what exactly resides beneath the sand they come from. Meanwhile, that very sand is threatening to take over by spreading over to all the continent.
Our heroes must discover the origins of the monsters, the truth behind the war, the real intention behind the sand and bring peace once more to the continent while dealing with their own inner conflicts.

FEATURES:


Over 15 to 20 hours of gameplay. Explore forests, ruins, deserts, temples, caves, villages and towns! The world of Sandfall is vast and diverse, rich in lore and backstory
Dynamic Party System! Switch between two casts of character while they both venture deeper and deeper into their own journey, witnessing how their fate intersect into one
6 Playable characters, each with their own personality, objectives, weapons and skills
Mouse Support for those who prefer it
Keep up with all your Main and Side Quests with a Quest Log that details your quests and their respective objectives
Complete sidequests to gain more knowledge of the world, rare treasures and meet incredible enemies
8 Secret Rooms, each containing precious treasures, that rewards player exploration
